title: Impact of some agricultural practices on soil quality

subtasks: Speaking the word "Thank you" multiple times in succession.
Pausing briefly between each instance of "Thank you."
Listening for an appropriate moment to indicate completion.
Confirming the stop with an audio cue (such as "thank you" again).
Setting up a camera to capture the scene.
Adjusting the camera's position or angle.
Starting the recording.

tasks.task: Performing post-production editing on a video.
subtasks: Reviewing footage for continuity or errors.
Cutting or splicing segments as needed.
Adding audio or visual effects.
Exporting the final product.
Directing the loader's bucket.
Moving soil or material as required.
Digging into a pile with the loader.
Shoveling material into the vehicle.
Securing load for transport.
Closing the gate or door of the vehicle.
Observing the animals' behavior.
Moving through the field or pasture.
Using voice commands or a whip to guide the animals.
Operating the steering wheel.
Adjusting speed and direction.
Engaging gears appropriately.
Monitoring machinery gauges and instruments.
Observing the surrounding environment for hazards.
